ygData.subject: anyone know how to raise faction with Ogre or Troll Guards?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Unfortunately for a Gnome there currently is no way to become liked by the trolls or the ogres.  I haven t found any mobs that give troll or ogre faction.
ygData.messageBody:
>
>is Gnome Necro kos in ogre or Troll City?
>if so , how do i raise the faction?

Unfortunately for a Gnome there currently is no way to become liked by the
trolls or the ogres. I haven't found any mobs that give troll or ogre
faction. The only way to boost Troll or Oger faction is if you already
have enough to enter the town and get quests. You can gain faction from
the quests but if your already KOS, your apparently SOL as well.

Lomack, Knight Defender of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
